files.updater.js: Added main updater script with version checking, file updates, and automatic backups
files.update.js: Added script runner for direct execution of updater
files.scripts/commands/update.js: Added Discord command for updating bot via !update command with interactive buttons
files.versions.json: Updated structure to support file tracking per version with config merging and file deletion
files.login/login.js: Added startup version check to notify users if update is available
files.UPDATER_README.md: Added comprehensive documentation for the update system
files.UPDATE_SYSTEM_SUMMARY.md: Added implementation summary and usage guide
files..gitignore: Added backups/backup_*/ pattern to ignore backup folders
files..gitkeep: Added gitkeep file to backups directory
